PAD_ReadResearch.synopsis: The player reads the journal of a dead druid in SCL. The druid was researching the Shadowcurse to see if it was spreading. After reading the journal the player rolls a Nature check to parse the notes

PAD_ReadResearch_0.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadResearch_0.text: Research on the nature of the shadow curse. Good to know.

PAD_ReadResearch_1.speaker: Player
PAD_ReadResearch_1.text: Something to do with the shadow curse? I truly hope this blight isn't spreading...
